title: Lanfranci, cantuariensis archi episcopi, in Berengarium Turonensem hereticum de corpore et sanguine Domini dialogus, opus quidem recens editum, sed ab ipso authore quingentis jam annis conscriptum. Cui additur Paschasii Ratberti de altissimo juxta ac sacr
author: Lanfranc, Archbishop of Canterbury, 1005?-1089
